About.description:
Bachelor of Computer Science from the College of Science and Technology (FCT - UNESP).

I work in the field using technologies such as React.js, Next.js, Typescript, Tailwindcss, ShadcnUI, RadixUI, NodeJs, TRPC, and Prisma ORM. Currently, I am seeking to improve my skills in mobile development with React Native and Expo.

Explore a diverse range of web and mobile projects in my portfolio,

highlighting professional expertise and dedication.

Explore my portfolio's section dedicated to showcasing a comprehensive range of skills in modern technologies,

fuel-tab.title: Fuel Agency
fuel-tab.subtitle: Intern
fuel-tab.description: I worked on the development and support of several websites in collaboration with the company.
fuel-tab.description2: I work in website development using technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Prisma ORM, MySQL, and REST API. A highlighted milestone in my professional journey was the implementation of the institutional website for the Açaí franchise OAKBERRY. In this project, I played a central role as the sole responsible individual, fully employing the aforementioned technologies for the website development and integration of the requested functionalities.

t2r-tab.title: T2R - Technological Solutions

t2r-tab.description: I worked on the development of the company's institutional website.
